question: The students watch ocean waves crash on a beach. Which statement describes what will most likely happen because of the waves?
candidate_answers: (A) Grass on the beach will grow longer. (B) Sand from the beach will wash away. (C) Salt from the ocean will be left on the beach. (D) Currents in the ocean will become stronger.
answer: Salt from the ocean will be left on the beach.
label: C
